title: ninaindurugum aDiyAr
sahitya:
ninaindurugum aDiyAr perumai ayanAdiyAr arivArO ayyan tiru malaraDi


anupallavi

  nanainda tAmarai malar karattAl kamala nangai anji varuDum malarp-pAdam


caraNam    IraDiyAl mUvulagaLandu maTrOraDi vaikka iyalAmal
 IrEzhulagum bhAvanam sheyyum gangai peruga mahAbali muDi tAngum tiruvaDi Ayar kulattilE
 yashOdai tAyin arugilE vaNNai vAyuDan mOhanap-punnakai veNNilavinilE pAyum yamunai 
nadiyilE kALingan maNi muDiyilE paiya shalangaigaL konja naTamiru pankaja malarp-pazhikkum sEvaDi
